text:
Metro Tasmania Fares Revocation Order 2023

I make the following order under section 22(2) of the Metro Tasmania Act 1997 .

10 October 2023

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Metro Tasmania Fares Revocation Order 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Legislation revoked
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is revoked.

4. Expiry of order
    This order is revoked on the first anniversary of the day on which this order took effect.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation revoked

Clause 3

Metro Tasmania Fares Order 2016 (No. 86 of 2016)
                                                


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 October 2023

This order is administered in the Department of State Growth.
